players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Since Diana was killed during the night, we know the mafia is still active. Bob, you stayed silent earlier—do you have any thoughts on who might be suspicious?"
You: "I think it's important we all share any suspicions or observations now. Silence won't help us find the mafia. Bob, Charlie, do you have any thoughts on who seemed off yesterday or today?"
Bob: "I'm still the mafioso, so I didn't kill anyone last night. Diana was my target."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
